title: Interpretation of seeing blue sapphires in a dream

preview.html: Seeing rubies in a dream is a good dream that carries different connotations for women and men. Dream scholars believe that exhaling in a married dream is a blessing in sustenance, money, and good offspring that will be announced soon. For a pregnant woman, blue sapphire indicates an approaching condition and ease of childbirth. The dream indicates that she will gain distant dreams and the ability to overcome the adversities she faces in reality. It is not good to lose or search for sapphires because this vision indicates loss of money and loss of opportunities. In this article, you have the most important interpretations related to seeing blue sapphires in a dream for men and women in detail. Interpretation of the appearance of the dream message in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing sapphires for a single and married person in a dream: Seeing one girl accompanied by a ruby ​​in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness, happiness and many good changes that will herald the girl. Buying a ruby ​​is also the ability to fulfill difficult desires and dreams and overcome adversity. If an unmarried woman sees a ruby ​​in a dream, this indicates the approach of sharing and getting closer From a wealthy person who has a good reputation among the people. While sapphires indicate the livelihood of a married woman in a dream, the source is halal. Obtaining many rubies in a dream is great psychological and physical comfort and may foretell an abundant inheritance. A husband offering his wife a ruby ​​in a dream and a soon pregnancy and offspring Blessed. Interpretation of seeing prawns in a dream by Ibn Sirin... Psychological stability for the dreamer. Sapphire for a pregnant woman in a dream. A pregnant woman may see blue sapphire in her dream, and this vision heralds her a healthy child from all evil offspring and blessings from God. While blue sapphire indicates the birth of a female. See Scientists and dream interpreters say that rubies in a pregnant woman’s dream are a blessing in money and the burden of difficult responsibilities. Interpretation of seeing a dream with stones in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The high position of the fortuneteller. Dream of a sapphire necklace. A sapphire necklace in a dream indicates the pregnancy of a married woman and the condition of a pregnant woman. While searching for a blue sapphire necklace indicates the fulfillment of difficult desires and dreams that the dreamer has long sought in his reality. A man offering a sapphire necklace to a woman indicates Unmarried to a close marriage with a person who has a good reputation among the people and who may be a source of happiness for her. In a pregnant woman’s dream, wearing a pure sapphire necklace indicates the birth of a woman. Interpretation of a dream about sand in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Clues and meanings related to seeing blue sapphires in a dream by Ibn Shaheen SirinImam Ibn Sirin believes that a sapphire in a dream indicates a good reputation among people and closeness to God Almighty through good deeds. A ring made of pure sapphire is in the dream of single and unmarried marriage. Ibn Sirin and dream scholars explained that a blue sapphire in a dream is a prestigious position in business. And profitable trade. In a merchant’s dream, wearing a necklace indicates abundant material gains and the ability to overcome adversity and difficulties. It is not good to break a ruby ​​in a dream, the

title: Interpretation of a dream about long hair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long hair in a dream. Long hair shows a lot of money and we wish you success because it is good news. Interpreters have confirmed that some visions with long hair are an indicator of happiness and joy. It is known that hair is the most important thing for a woman, but this dream also has a role. From a man, the interpretation differs in the shape of the hair in the dream as well as the color, and long hair shows luck, piety, and money. Ibn Sirin’s dream of long hair. The interpretation of a dream about long hair in a dream indicates an increase in money and prosperity. He dreamed of long hair, and the dreamer was satisfied with it, and it was a pleasant vision for him. A sign of a lot of good and happy news. A merchant dreams that his hair has grown, as this indicates profit in the trade he is engaged in, success, and luck. To dream of long white hair in a dream is testimony to the dreamer’s carefree life. Al-Nabulsi dreamed of long hair. Al-Nabulsi interpreted hair. Long in a dream means long life and a large increase in money, and with this Ibn Sirin agreed. Dreaming of long braided hair is evidence of the many debts that one may see. Long hair dreams of an unmarried woman. An unmarried girl dreams that her hair has become very long, as this is a sign of success and luck in her life. Long hair in a girl’s dream indicates the happiness that she is experiencing, because it indicates Also to longevity. Thus, long hair shows the great love that exists within this girl. Dreaming of a young man combing his long hair is a sign of an upcoming marriage. Seeing short hair in a girl’s dream and she is not satisfied with it indicates unhappiness and lack of joy. A dream about long hair for a married woman is considered a dream about hair. Long hair in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy soon. If she thinks she is cutting her long hair, this indicates a delayed pregnancy. If she sees her long and soft hair, this is a sign of a lot of money and a good life. A married woman dreams that her husband’s hair is very long, which indicates a source of Sustenance for children is of great importance. A dream about long hair for a pregnant woman, and a dream about a pregnant woman who has long hair indicates the birth of a boy. Long black hair in a dream during pregnancy is a sign of your feeling of safety and security. Very long black hair in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates good health that she enjoys. Dreaming of a man’s long hair. Long hair in a dream for an unmarried young man is a sign of marriage soon. Long hair also indicates a lot of money and a happy life. Long hair in general in a man’s dream brings praiseworthy visions and there will be a lot of good. Seeing long hair in A dream means money and a good life. Seeing long black hair indicates abundant goodness for the pioneer. Seeing long hair for the poor indicates for the rich. Long hair dreams of divorced women. Seeing long and smooth hair in happy news. Seeing dry and thick hair also indicates life’s difficulties and trials. Long hair appears Also a lot of good for divorced women. Seeing thick hair indicates

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a hijab in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the hijab in a dream: The hijab in a dream is one of the visions that has many interpretations, and it is known that the hijab is the religious veil that God Almighty commanded Muslim women to wear, and the interpretation of the word hijab means anything. It binds or covers the mind. The different interpretation of seeing a veil in a dream varies depending on the difference in the dream, but also according to the viewer’s difference if she is married, single, or pregnant. It is possible for a young man to see a hijab in a dream, as well as a married man. Interpretation of a dream about a silencer. If a girl sees in a dream that she is wearing a hijab, and this is not what she wants, and she is nervous about wearing it, then this is evidence of her intense desire for God to respond to her (glory be to Him). Praying, but God wants to test her patience and wants her to get very close to Him and not despair of praying. Because God will respond to her very soon. The hijab in an unmarried woman’s dream. If an unmarried girl sees that she wants to wear the hijab in a dream, and someone prevents her in her dream, then this vision is evidence of her love for the man and that she wants to marry him, but there is a major obstacle in that. The way they are, and that one of her family rejects this man. If an unmarried girl sees that she wants to take off her hijab in a dream and takes it off while she is upset, then this vision is not good and is evidence of misfortunes and problems that affect her health and psychological life. Interpretation of a dream about a green veilThe green veil in a girls’ dream or Children with knowledge are evidence of success in studies, but success will be superior and not just success. The green color in an unmarried girl’s dream is considered a praiseworthy color, as it is evidence of the girl’s purity, self-respect and dignity, and that she is a girl with good morals and a good reputation. If a married woman sees In a dream, a green veil, this is evidence of the importance of the blessing of concealment in her life and that she will have the opportunity to get closer to God (Glory be to Him). If a man sees in a dream a green veil, and that he is wearing it for his wife, then it is a vision and good news and evidence of well-being and intense piety, and that he will enter Paradise. He takes his wife's hand. To him and that this family is blessed. You still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Seeing a veil in a dream Seeing a veil in the dream of an indifferent girl is not always a praiseworthy dream. Sometimes it is interpreted as obscenity and immorality when she sees herself wearing an unusual hijab as if it were upside down or in the Spanish manner. When a girl sees that she is wearing a hijab in a dream and the girl is wearing it in reality, this vision is evidence of the girl’s good circumstances and that she is with God (Glory be to Him) is one of the things worthy of praise in this world and the hereafter, and that He will provide a very good and abundant provision with the mind that does not follow any other path. The white veil in a dream Seeing an unmarried girl with a white veil in a dream is evidence that a good husband will obtain it soon, but seeing The white veil in the sheikh’s dream is a vision that promises heaven and the time of death is approaching. When a married woman sees her...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a kite in a Nabulsi dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans Interpretation of a dream about a kite In Nabulsi’s dream, kites are considered birds of prey that humans avoid and spread widely during the day to hunt prey for food and they are medium in size. Regions. There are about 11 types of kites in many countries such as Asia, Europe and some northern regions, and the kite in a dream has many interpretations, and the interpretation is different for women and also for men, and each of them has its own interpretation for you that you will learn in detail through our article. Interpretation of a dream Ibn Sirin's Kite A kite in a dream shows strength. Seeing someone in a dream holding a kite is evidence of the money the person receives. A dream about small kites indicates boys. A kite in a dream is a sign of thieves. Kites cause war and murder. They indicate Kites indicate a humble king. Seeing a kite in the house is evidence of corruption and hypocrisy. A kite in a dream may indicate a humble king prone to evil or an evil person who lacks character. Interpretation of a dream about a kite about Nabulsi. A dream about catching a kite in a dream indicates the presence of a male child. Kitty can indicate the blessings that the dreamer receives. If anyone sees a dream that kites cannot fly, this indicates that he was born male. Kites are evidence of a man of good character and also indicate an adulterous woman. When you see a large number of kites, this A sign of people's deception. Eating a kite in a dream is a sign of its bad owners. Seeing a kite approaching the ground indicates the righteousness of this person who is aware. Seeing falcons hunting is evidence that you are earning lawful money. Interpretation of a dream about a man flying a kiteIf one sees In his dream that he has a kite and is chasing it, this indicates the huge money and food that he will receive. Seeing a kite in a dream indicates the presence of a rude woman in this man’s life. If a man sees in a dream a wild kite trying to resist him, this indicates that he will bless a boy but he will die If someone sees that he has a cat and that it is obedient, he will get money. If a man cuts the wing of a kite, this indicates that he is controlling his wife. Cat meat indicates new clothes and a happy life. If he sees a kite moving away from him and not returning, he will divorce His wife. Whoever sees that he flew a kite, this is an indication that the dreamer will give birth to a son, but he will die. Interpretation of the dream of a kite carrier: If you see a kite on a girl’s head, this indicates death. If a pregnant woman sees a kite flying from her hand in a dream, this It indicates the death of the fetus in her womb. Add the dream you want interpreted in a comment below the article and we will answer it and explain it.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream: My mother gave me money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my mother gave me money. Scholars offer different explanations for seeing my mother giving me money. We find that some jurists do not praise giving one’s mother’s money to a fortune teller and consider it a harbinger of bad luck, while others see that giving paper money has desirable meanings such as benevolence and happiness. And the death of adversity, and in this article we will learn about the most important hundreds of interpretations to see a mother giving her son money by major commentators, especially Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that my mother gave me money. Anyone who sees his mother giving him money in a dream, this is a sign that she is offering him help and assistance and always stands by his side in crises. If the mother dies and the dreamer sees that she is giving him money, this is evidence of what is permissible. A student who sees his mother giving him banknotes in a dream is a sign of success and excellence in study. I dreamed that my mother gave me money by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a mother giving money to a pregnant woman is evidence On her satisfaction with him, his justice, and his mercy for her. If a married woman sees that her mother gives her a lot of money in a dream, this is evidence of protection, health, and abundance. A mother’s gift of money to her unmarried son in a dream is a sign of a new prestigious job. I dreamed that my mother gave me money to bachelors. It is said that money In a single woman’s dream, it is a sign of purity and good morals, if its source is lawful, so what if the dreamer sees her mother giving her her money: A girl who sees her mother handing over her money and smiling at her is a sign that she will soon hear good news and happiness. It is said that seeing an unmarried woman giving her money is a sign of her giving it away. From evil and relief from her distress. The interpretation of a dream about a mother giving money to her unmarried daughter may symbolize her success in studies and her reward. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees her deceased mother giving her coins, she may face some problems and disagreements, whether with her family or with her friends. She dreamed That my mother gave me money for a married woman is related to money in a dream for a married woman, and the abundance of money is a sign of goodness. What is the interpretation of scholars when I see my mother giving me money for a married woman? If a married woman sees that her mother is giving her a lot of money in her dream, this is a sign that her husband will enter into a new business partnership, from which they will make huge profits. The mother is a source of support and the interpretation of my mother’s dream is that She gave me money to a married woman indicates that the mother provides assistance to the visionary in times of crisis and stands by her and provides moral support and financial assistance as well. Giving the mother coins to a married woman in a dream can warn her that her husband is going through a financial crisis that affects their standard of living and she must support him and stand by him In a crisis. Seeing a wife, mother, donating money and putting it in the hands of her children is good news for their academic excellence and success. I dreamed that money was given to me by a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman giving her money, which may lead to distress in the situation and the accumulation of birth expenses on her husband. It is said that seeing a pregnant mother giving her money Give her silver money

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead visiting us at home in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing a dead person visiting us at home in a dream. If he smiles, this indicates his good standing in the afterlife and the dreamer’s good deeds. Seeing him in a married woman’s house in a dream symbolizes happiness with her husband and the birth of good offspring. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person visiting a pregnant woman’s house. A deceased woman visiting a pregnant woman and sitting with her in a dream is a sign of many good things that will happen to her when her child is born. Also, a pregnant woman who sees a dead woman will visit her in a dream. The dream when she is sad is evidence that she did good deeds and stopped them and she must do them again and continue doing them. Where the deceased gives candy to a pregnant woman in a dream, this promises her an easy and easy birth and she will gain a lot of goodness. Seeing the dead in a new home Visit the dead to the dreamer while he is there. Wear clothes that are white. Or green and its shape is elegant with a tinge where it will be in the afterlife. Interpretation of seeing the deceased visiting us at home and he is sad. I mean I see visiting the dead. The dreamer is in his house and sadness in the dream is a sign of begging him and zakat. Then the vision symbolizes that the dreamer will do bad deeds and will be forced to abandon them and get closer to God Almighty. Seeing the dead visiting the living And they give them food for the skin indicates a lot of goodness that the dreamer will receive. The dream also promises the answer to the dreamer’s prayers and the fulfillment of his aspirations. Seeing dead people in an old house Seeing a dead person in an old house renovating it in a dream means that the dreamer will receive a lot of money. As the previous vision portends a change In the dreamer’s life for the better. Seeing the dead eating in his family’s home. Seeing the dead. Visiting his family in a dream, and certain types of food are eaten until full, this indicates the death of a family member. The deceased was eating food with his family and they were talking to them and feeling happy in the dream, which indicates the marriage of a young man. Unmarried. In addition to the deceased giving food and sweets to the pregnant wife in the dream, this is a sign that she gave birth to an easy child and gave birth to a child that brings with it a lot of good. Seeing a dead person visiting a sick person Seeing a dead person visiting a sick person in a dream means recovery from illness, good health, and longevity, and God knows best. Seeing a dead person visiting a sick person Seeing a dead person visiting a sick person in a dream means recovery from illness, good health, and long life, and God knows best. Seeing a dead person sick Visiting the dreamer In a dream, it indicates that he wronged a person and did not give him his rights before his death. Likewise, if a sick person walks with a deceased person in a dream for a long distance and feels happy, this indicates his long life and closeness to his lips, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about returning home from the dead. See the dreamer in whom the dead man returns To his home, he wears elegant clothes and tells them that he is alive, bearing witness to his venerable position in the afterlife, and God knows best. Seeing a dead person returning home sick in a dream symbolizes the need to give alms and pray for him. As is evident from the vision, the dead father returns home angry in a dream because of the dispute. Between his children in the inheritance, or that the dreamer is doing bad things, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased parent visiting the house. A deceased parent’s visit to his family is evidence of the obligation of charity and supplication for him. The dream also shows that the dreamer is reminded to be

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of a dream about a car that drives without a driver

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver: It is rare to see a car driving without someone driving it. It is considered one of the ambitions that we want to achieve in the future, which will mean progress and development. When he sees it in a dream, the dreamer wonders: What is the interpretation? Does his interpretation bring him good and does he expect good news from us or evil and seek refuge from it? Therefore, through this article, we will review the largest number of issues related to this symbol, as well as the opinions and sayings of leading scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver: Seeing a car driving without a driver in a dream has many connotations and signs that can be recognized in the following cases: A car driving without a driver in a dream shows the worries and sorrows that the dreamer will suffer from in the coming period. If a single person dreams of a car that he drives without a driver, this indicates the change that will occur in his social status and the possibility of his marrying a girl who does not suit him and this marriage will not last. Seeing a car moving without a driver Being driven by someone in a dream means that the dreamer will be affected by the evil eye, magic, and his inability to manage his life’s affairs. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver by Ibn Sirin. The venerable Imam did not think about cars in his time, so we will compare his interpretations of the means of transportation at that time, and here are some of his interpretations: He believes Ibn Sirin said that seeing a car driving without a driver indicates problems and troubles that the dreamer is going through that disrupt his life. If the dreamer sees in his dream a car that he can drive without anyone driving it, this means that he will move to a new job, but he will leave it soon due to many disasters and conspiracies that occur from Localization of people I hate at work. Driving a car without a driver in a dream may symbolize for the dreamer that he is committing some wrong actions and needs to repent and return to God. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver for individuals. The interpretation of seeing a car driving without a driver in a dream varies depending on the social status of the dreamer, and after Therefore, we will explain the unmarried girl’s perception of this symbol: An unmarried girl who sees in her dream a car driving without a driver, indicates the difficulty of achieving her desires and achieving her ambitions despite her serious efforts. If a girl sees a car in her dream, but she drives the car alone without a driver, this symbolizes her relationship with someone Irresponsible and less intellectual and scientific than her, which makes her marriage end in failure. If a woman is driving without a driver in a woman’s dream, it indicates that she has heard bad news that saddens her heart and puts her in a bad psychological state. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman driving without a driver A married woman who sees in her dream A car without a driver indicates that she has committed many wrong actions that cause conflicts between her and her husband. If a woman dreams of driving a car without anyone driving it, this symbolizes her inability to achieve her goals and ambitions, which causes her disappointment and feelings of depression. Interpretation of a dream for a pregnant woman Operating a driverless carDuring pregnancy, a woman sees dreams with symbols that are difficult for her to understand,

title: Symbols that indicate victory in a dream and overcoming enemies

preview.html: Among the symbols that indicate victory in a dream is reading the Qur’an and the verses that indicate victory, and seeing a lawyer and a court in a dream is an indication of getting rid of injustice and victory over the enemy. The article is to learn about the most important symbols that indicate victory over enemies in a vision. Symbols that indicate victory in a dream and signs of victory in a dream. One of the most important symbols of victory is the vision of the messengers and prophets, as the vision of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, indicates the victory of the oppressed according to Ibn Sirin, and a vision may indicate Messengers in a dream announce the victory of the believers and the destruction of the infidels. It indicates the search for the truth. Seeing a lawyer in a dream indicates supporting the truth, and whoever sees that he appoints a lawyer and wins his call in the dream, he wins his enemies, and if you see that you have become a lawyer in the dream, this indicates that you stand by the oppressed and support you. Seeing the stick in The dream symbolizes victory. Whoever sees that he is threatening someone with a stick in a dream, this means that he stands by his side. Also, seeing spoils in a dream means victory over enemies. Seeing an oath or an oath in the Qur’an in a dream means victory and the victory of a person returning to the dreamer, and whoever It is seen that he says that there is no power nor strength except with God in the dream, as this indicates seeking help from God and receiving support and assistance from Him. Sublime and righteous because seeing repentance in a dream symbolizes victory and loss of tension. Whoever sees himself eating the meat of a lion in a dream, his arch enemy will defeat him, according to Al-Nabulsi. Seeing a lioness drinking milk in a dream means obtaining money from a sultan and victory over enemies, and if you see that you are riding a monkey In a dream, you defeat an enemy, and also a horse in a dream symbolizes the prestige of victory, possession, and high status. Palaces and castles in a dream indicate strength and victory over enemies. Whoever sees high walls in a dream, this indicates victory and protection from harming others. Seeing flying in a dream means advancement and achieving great victories. And God knows best. The verses and surahs that declare victory in Manamasura Victory in a dream is one of the Qur’anic surahs that symbolize victory over enemies. Whoever dreams of reading Surat Al-Asr in a dream will find relief in his affairs and victory over his enemies. Also, hearing Surat Al-Falaq in a dream indicates improved conditions and victory over haters and envious people. Seeing Surat Al-Shams in a dream means victory and victory in all matters and matters, according to Al-Nabulsi. And whoever sees the Almighty’s saying: “And it is for us to support the believers.” Dreaming about symbols that indicate victory over the enemy. Among the symbols that indicate victory over the enemy is carrying a firearm in a dream. And whoever sees He carries a white weapon in a dream, so he is safe from the harm of enemies and defeats them. Seeing buying a weapon in a dream means strength and achieving goals, and seeing a powerful weapon in a dream shows terror and intimidation of the enemy. Whoever sees that he is hitting his enemy in a dream, this indicates his submission and victory over him. If you see that you are fleeing from the enemy in a dream, this means safety from his harm, and you see the enemy without clothes. The dream indicates his exposure in front of A

title: Interpretation of death in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Seeing death in a dream is one of the confusing and hidden visions for many. There are those who believe that it foretells the imminent death, and there are those who believe that it means an increase in life, but the interpretation of death in a dream varies depending on the vision itself and the condition and type of the viewer, whether it is so. Male or female, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will present to you different interpretations of death in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. The shroud, except for his head and feet, indicates the corruption of his religion. And whoever sees that he was buried alive in his grave, it is clear that he will be imprisoned by his burial, and if he dies in the grave after that, he will be subjected to obsessions that will kill him, and if he comes out of the grave. After burying him, he declares his repentance. As for the vision of traveling with a dead person, it indicates that the dreamer will travel to a far place and obtain a lot of good from it, and whoever sees that he is carrying a dead person around his neck will receive a lot of money. . Eating with the dead indicates a long life for the dreamer. Seeing the dead person washed indicates his freedom from worries and an increase in his wealth. If he washes him, he will repent in his hands and his condition will improve. If he hears of the news of the death of someone he knows, his debt will be ruined and his earthly life will be fixed. Whoever kills his son in a dream will be freed from his enemy. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing death in a dream: Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing a person dying in a dream is evidence of long life, and if he sees himself dying while naked, he will lose a lot of money, and whoever sees that he died and cried and people shouted at him, he will be revealed. To problems that may lead to the destruction of his home. The death of an enemy in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s reconciliation with him and the end of disputes between them. Whoever dies and comes back to life commits a sin, then repents for it, then returns to it again. If the head of state or scholar dies, he warns of a disaster in the country. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of death in a dream. Al-Nabulsi narrated that whoever sees himself dead and does not see signs of death, such as mourning and shrouding, is evidence of a blessing in the dreamer’s health and lifespan, and the death of a sister in a dream indicates that he heard happy. News. Whoever sees someone who died and then came back to life, this means that he committed sins and repented for them, then returned to them. The family of the dead, and if the dead person dies again, but screams and manifestations of sadness appear, that is, the proximity of one of the relatives of that dead person. Seeing condolences and crying without a sound is evidence of the closest solution to problems and worries. Death in the dream of single people. Seeing the death of an unmarried girl in a dream indicates that her marriage Imminent, especially if the vision is free of crying and screaming. If an unmarried girl sees herself dying and being buried, this is evidence of a happy life awaiting her. . Death in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the death of a married woman in a dream portends divorce, and if she is not buried in the bathroom, it means that she will live a happy life. Death of parents in a dream. Seeing the death of one’s father in a dream indicates the longevity of one’s life, while the death of one’s mother is evidence of failure to achieve anything. A goal in life, and the death of a brother indicates a lot of livelihood and money, and the death of a sister is evidence. With the arrival of an event

If he sees himself dying and naked, he will lose a lot of money. The death of an enemy in a dream is evidence of the dreamer's reconciliation with him and the end of the differences between them. Whoever dies and returns to life, commits a sin, then repents from it, then returns to it again. If the head of state or the scholar dies, he warns of a disaster in the country. Al-Nabulsi's interpretation of death in a dream Al-Nabulsi narrated that whoever sees himself dead and does not see the signs of death such as mourning and a shroud is evidence of a blessing in the dreamer's health and life, and the death of a sister in a dream indicates that he heard happiness. News. And whoever sees someone who died and then returned to life, this means that he committed sins and repented of them and then returned to them. The people of the dead, and if the dead person dies again, but screams and manifestations of sadness appear, meaning the proximity of one of the relatives of that dead person. Seeing condolences and crying without a voice is evidence of the nearest solution to problems and worries. Death in a single person's dream Seeing the death of an unmarried girl in a dream indicates that her marriage is imminent, especially if the vision is free of crying and screaming, and if the unmarried girl sees herself dying and being buried, this is evidence of a happy life awaiting her. . . Death in a dream for a married woman Seeing the death of a married woman in a dream portends divorce, and if she is not buried in the bathroom, this means that she will live a happy life. The death of parents in a dream Seeing the death of a father in a dream indicates a person's longevity, while the death of the mother is evidence of failure to achieve any goal in life and the death of the brother indicates a lot of livelihood and money and the death of the sister is evidence. With the arrival of a happy event
